Package raymarching.shapes

Class Cylinder

java.lang.Object
raymarching.shapes.Shape
raymarching.shapes.Cylinder
public class Cylinder extends Shape
A subclass of Shape defining a cylinder.

  • Constructor Details

    • Cylinder

      public Cylinder(double[] args, double[] dargs)
      Creates a new Cylinder from args and dargs. args must match the parameters in Cylinder.PARAMS. dargs must match the parameters in Shape.DEFAULT_PARAMS.
      Parameters:
      args - an array of doubles representing the paramaters described in Cylinder.PARAMS.
      dargs - an array of doubles representing the paramaters described in Shape.DEFAULT_PARAMS.

  • Method Details

    • getLocalDistance

      protected double getLocalDistance(Vector r)
      Description copied from class: Shape
      Computes the least distance from a point given in coordinates local to the shape to the surface of the volume.
      Specified by:
      getLocalDistance in class Shape
      Parameters:
      r - the point
      Returns:
      the least distance from v to the surface of the volume, which is a negative value if the point is inside the volume.

    • setBoundRadius

      protected double setBoundRadius()
      Description copied from class: Shape
      Computes the bound radius of the shape based on its dimensions. Called automatically as needed.
      Specified by:
      setBoundRadius in class Shape
      Returns:
      the least radius of a sphere centered on the shape that completely contains it.
